Title: Metro Manila
Writer: Sean Ellis (screenplay), Frank E. Flowers (screenplay), Sean Ellis (story)
Actors: Jake Macapagal, John Arcilla, Althea Vega, Erin Panlilio
Plot: Seeking a brighter future in megacity Manila, Oscar Ramirez and his family flee their impoverished life in the rice fields of the northern Philippines. But the sweltering capital's bustling...
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 9 wins & 11 nominations.
